title: Handle a Short Shipment Claim
description: A customer claims they were shorted an item in their shipment. The agent must investigate and resolve.

tasks.description: Find the customer's order and the shipment details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the relevant order and shipment info.

tasks.description: Review the packing details for the shipment, including the recorded weight of the package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the final package weight.

tasks.description: Compare the actual shipped weight to the expected weight if the order had been complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: The weight check confirms that the package was too light, supporting the customer's claim.

tasks.description: Issue a credit to the customer for the shorted item and apologize for the error.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is credited for the missing item.
